item.description:
So you have hit submit on the talk proposal and you have received an e-mail that your talk has been accepted ðŸŽ‰ðŸ’Œ! Congratulations! Yay! Now here are some tips on preparing for your very first conference talk. I’ll be sharing some of my personal experiences, which I hope is helpful.

ðŸ˜® Disclaimer: My experience was with an AWS Community Days event, so every conference may run a little differently. But I hope these tips will still help you feel more confident and ready! ðŸ˜Š
